level.heading: Reviewing compliance.
level.text: The prudent investor rule expresses a standard of conduct, not a particular outcome. Compliance with the prudent investor rule is determined in light of the facts and circumstances existing at the time of a trustee's decision or action.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 15-104
level.text: For Law 15-104, see notes following ยง 19-1301.01.
